pageTitle: The Swellers join No Sleep, plan new album for the fall | Punknews.org
textBeforeTable: The band have posted an announcement video -- sort of -- that can be seen below. They'll be touring a bit this summer, playing a few midwest shows before a stint on the Vans Warped Tour and a couple shows in Brazil. Those dates are below, too. Running Out of Places to Go, last year. Good for Me and a self-released EP, Ups and Downsizing and 2011's Fueled By Ramen for 2009's No Sleep Records, following a two-album stint on The Swellers will release a new full-length this fall via (EDT) Friday, May 24, 2013 at 1:00 PM bryne on Posted by The Swellers join No Sleep, plan new album for the fall Login Contact Us New Releases Reviews Tours Interviews Best New Music Streams
